Okie, over 50% of the last 40 posts or so (including this one) were OOCs. That's not a good sign :-)

Less socializing, more RPGing! WHat do you think this is, somwhere where you make friends?! No! This is work work work! >:)

Kidding. But serious, I know its all my fault, but lets take the birthday topics and stuff to the message board on the site. We'll have much more fun talking about them there. :-)
